segment.source: After completing all necessary planning and then deploying Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you can configure Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring to run in a highly available fashion while using it to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption operations.
segment.target: After completing all necessary planning and then deploying Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you can configure Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring to run in a highly available fashion while using it to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption operations.

segment.source: The information in this section describes high availability options for MBAM as well as how to move MBAM Server features.
segment.target: The information in this section describes high availability options for MBAM as well as how to move MBAM Server features.

segment.source: MBAM was designed to be fault-tolerant and not negatively affect the users if a server is not available.
segment.target: MBAM was designed to be fault-tolerant and not negatively affect the users if a server is not available.

segment.source: The information in this section can be used to configure a highly available MBAM installation.
segment.target: The information in this section can be used to configure a highly available MBAM installation.

segment.source: Move MBAM 2.0 Features to Another Server
segment.target: Move MBAM 2.0 Features to Another Server

segment.source: If you need to move an MBAM Server feature from one server computer to another, you must complete required steps in a specific order to avoid a loss of productivity or data.
segment.target: If you need to move an MBAM Server feature from one server computer to another, you must complete required steps in a specific order to avoid a loss of productivity or data.

segment.source: This section describes the steps that you must complete to move one or more MBAM Server features to a different computer.
segment.target: This section describes the steps that you must complete to move one or more MBAM Server features to a different computer.

segment.source: How to Move MBAM 2.0 Features to Another Computer
segment.target: How to Move MBAM 2.0 Features to Another Computer
